issue.title: Client fails to connect to the server because the server begins to listen only later

content.raw:
Note that step 2 must be done within 30 seconds of step 1, otherwise it [times out](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f4e51e8f64001beda70615ab8982a7d5a4e65b18/gazebo/transport/TransportIface.hh?fileviewer=file-view-default#TransportIface.hh-58).

~~~
$ gzclient --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.5.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Err] [ConnectionManager.cc:119] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.
[Err] [gazebo_shared.cc:83] Unable to initialize transport.
[Err] [gazebo_client.cc:62] Unable to setup Gazebo
~~~
content.html:
Note that step 2 must be done within 30 seconds of step 1, otherwise it times out.

$ gzclient --verbose
Gazebo multi-robot simulator, version 9.5.0
Copyright (C) 2012 Open Source Robotics Foundation.
Released under the Apache 2 License.
http://gazebosim.org

[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Err] [ConnectionManager.cc:119] Failed to connect to master in 30 seconds.
[Err] [gazebo_shared.cc:83] Unable to initialize transport.
[Err] [gazebo_client.cc:62] Unable to setup Gazebo
